content: About meI am just a random software engineer on the internet who really like to build cool things and be at the edge playing with all the most interesting technology we have to offer. Currently, I am deeply interested in the field of Deep Learning on edge devices and scaling Deep Learning services for production in a reliable and cost efficient manner. The name of this blog come from the fact that I am very lazy about a lot of things, and that laziness has helped me find shorter path to do a lot more things. With that spirit in mind, I want this blog to be an interesting place to showcase my lazy finding and hopefully help someone too.

A list of things I want to doHere are a mix of some aspiration I have in life, some random shower thought, and some spontaneous things I would like to do with my life before I kick the bucket. Start a tech company Establish a non-profit organisation to digitalise mountainous area in Vietnam Contribute at least USD$10k to impactful open source projects Make a personal blog Write a technical book Write a start-up book Give a Ted talk about something interesting Learn how to fly a plane Try out traveling first class on an airplane Try out driving a supercar Start a Vietnamese streetfood chain company Start a relatively popular open source project (min 1k stars) Learn Mandarin to HSK6 (HSK3) Learn Bahasa Malaysia to conversational Learn French to conversational Learn Spanish to conversational Learn Japanese to conversational Learn Korean to conversational Learn how to do a handstand Get a Master Get a PhD Get a degree from MIT and/or Stanford Own a high precision manufacturing company Start an open source project Publish a few research papers

A list of thing that I want to buildThis is where I brain-dump all of my “greatest idea ever that may or may not see the light of day that I want to build.” Another Tensor Library Make a note editor as a PWA that can run on Ipad Contribute new exercise to Exercism in the Zig track Make a algorithm visualization platform that translates code into visual for ease of learning An alternative to Bacon in Rust but for Zig A TUI for managing Docker in the Terminal (because screw the bloated GUI)
